channel.title: poem on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in poem on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: A sunbeam child
item.description: Written in August, 2013 Smells of magnified burnt leaves Light tinges of Jasmine The Sun is beautiful, the grass so green The bee patiently collects nectar

item.title: I found a lost poem written on 29th March
item.description: I found a lost poem written on 29th March 2012 _grey clouds have blocked out the blue sky the air is cold and stillnot a sound sensations are numb
